Name: status_must_be_active
Description: Only consider teams that are active

Name: project_within_budget
Description: Projects must remain within planned budget

Name: sprint_with_defined_goal
Description: Only sprints that have a goal

Name: release_must_be_planned
Description: Work tied to a planned release

Name: roadmap_alignment_preferred
Description: Prefer items aligned to roadmap milestones

Name: velocity_baseline_sprints
Description: Use velocity only if enough sprints measured
